description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet communities. His work spans various domains, including ecosystem architecture, decentralized systems, and regenerative design. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses reflect his diverse interests, covering topics like internet fragmentation, innovation practices, and sustainable collaboration. He advocates for value pluralism and the importance of aligning technology with nature and human needs.
blurb: yeehaa: ecosystem architect, philosopher, and tech innovator. Blends academia and entrepreneurship to transform education and foster inclusive digital communities. Advocates for decentralized systems, regenerative design, and value pluralism in technology and society.
